message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a unique and valuable product. I'm willing to sell it to you for $20000. Is this something you'd be interested in?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $15000. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle at $17500?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. However, I'm not quite ready to meet you at $17500. I'm willing to consider $18500. What are your thoughts?
I'm still interested in the product, but I'm not comfortable with $18500. I'd be willing to pay $17000 for it. Can you meet me at this price?
I understand you're trying to get the best deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $18000, but I'm not going to go any lower than that. This is as close to your offer as I'm willing to get.
